trans-unit.source: At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player mills two cards.

trans-unit.resname: PW11·80 | Curse of the Bloody Tome | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After seeing his life's work drip away, the mage decided it was a good time to go crazy.
trans-unit.target: After seeing his life's work drip away, the mage decided it was a good time to go crazy.

trans-unit.resname: PW11·83 | Bloodcrazed Neonate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME attacks each combat if able.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME attacks each combat if able.

trans-unit.resname: PW11·83 | Bloodcrazed Neonate | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

trans-unit.source: While elder vampires select their meals with care, the newly sired frenzy at the first whiff.
trans-unit.target: While elder vampires select their meals with care, the newly sired frenzy at the first whiff.

trans-unit.resname: PW11·84 | Boneyard Wurm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

trans-unit.source: The only thing it likes more than discovering a pit of bones is adding to it.
trans-unit.target: The only thing it likes more than discovering a pit of bones is adding to it.
